name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword, suitable for beginners.

name: Leather Armor
description: Lightweight armor made from hardened leather.

name: Health Elixir
description: Restores a small amount of health when consumed.

name: Old Coin
description: A strange coin from an unknown origin.

name: Ancient Relic
description: A mysterious artifact needed to complete a quest.

name: Iron Ore
description: Basic material used in weapon and armor crafting.

name: Pickaxe
description: Used to mine ores from rocks.

name: Mana Potion
description: Restores a small amount of mana.

name: Bread
description: A loaf of bread to stave off hunger.

name: Traveler's Cloak
description: A cloak that protects from wind and rain.
